metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5395 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FontForge 20190801 has a use-after-free in SFD_GetFontMetaData in sfd.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-5395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontforge - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
fontforge-common - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
fontforge-extras - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
fontforge-nox - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
libfontforge4 - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
python3-fontforge - 1:20201107~dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fontforge package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:20201107~dfsg-2').
